revised_title: Astromyelon: A New Fossil Plant Species from the Coal-Measures
tldr: The author discovers a new species of fossil plant, Astromyelon, found in the coal-measures. Unlike Calamites, Astromyelon has a distinct structure with no articulations and a non-fistular medulla. The author classifies Astromyelon in the Cryptogamic group due to its exogenous growth and characteristic barred vessels.
